title: Senior Communications Program Manager, Digital Content
summary: The Environment and Supply Chain Innovation team upholds Apple’s values across our global supply chain. Communication and storytelling are critical to supporting our mission as we raise awareness and inspire advocacy and action across Apple and our industry. We are seeking an experienced communications program manager to lead digital content development across our platforms, including apple.com and SupplierCare, our platform for supplier communication and training.
description: As a seasoned expert in communications and creative production, you will lead the development of content for our communications platforms, including apple.com, our internal website, and SupplierCare, which is our platform for supplier communication and training. This includes strategic planning for the creation and delivery of content including major annual website refreshes and day-to-day communications and training delivery on SupplierCare. Your scope will also include the continual evolution of our content production standards, as well as working with developers to drive the system enhancements required to support them, and development of the platforms’ content itself. You will collaborate deeply within the team, integrating key communications priorities into the deliverables you lead, as well as work daily with key partner organizations including public relations, government affairs, marketing communications, and technical experts across the company. Your work will serve many audiences, including our employees, customers, suppliers and their employees, and the media. Success will depend on being able to internalize and strategically communicate deeply technical content across many issue areas, while also understanding the reach of our business, telling the story of the people and environment across our global supply chain, and inspiring others across the industry (and beyond) to take action.
preferred_qualifications: Excellent written and verbal communication skills, Demonstrated ability to develop effective creative strategies and lead others in executing against them, Able to manage a dynamic communications environment, flexing to address evolving priorities, Expert at building and maintaining strong relationships in deeply cross-functional environments, Passion for creating values-driven content, Experience with sustainability and ESG reporting and subject matter areas and related industry trends, Experience managing editorial voice and consistency across a portfolio of work that includes multiple media and audiences, Comfortable leading content reviews for technical experts and executives, Confidence in working with technical source material, and interest and capacity to engage with new subject matter areas, Ability to operate and collaborate at all levels of the organization, including working directly with senior executives, Can flex between understanding and shaping the big picture, to focusing on the tiniest of details, Skilled in leading complex projects and accomplishing work through others, Advanced experience with content management systems, graphic design and presentation production processes and principles, and photography and filmmaking workflows, Ability to travel 5% domestically and/or internationally
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay is one part of our total compensation package and is determined within a range. This provides the opportunity to progress as you grow and develop within a role. The base pay range for this role is between $143,900 and $216,900, and your base pay will depend on your skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Apple employees also have the opportunity to become an Apple shareholder through participation in Apple’s discretionary employee stock programs. Apple employees are eligible for discretionary restricted stock unit awards, and can purchase Apple stock at a discount if voluntarily participating in Apple’s Employee Stock Purchase Plan. You’ll also receive benefits including: Comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, a range of discounted products and free services, and for formal education related to advancing your career at Apple, reimbursement for certain educational expenses — including tuition. Additionally, this role might be eligible for discretionary bonuses or commission payments as well as relocation. Learn more about Apple Benefits. Note: Apple benefit, compensation and employee stock programs are subject to eligibility requirements and other terms of the applicable plan or program.
